text:
@CNN @GavinNewsom come on man, California has been unable to deal with its financial issues for awhile now.
We would have gone with it being "exasperated" or "deepened" by coronavirus but acting like it's only cause of it? Nah, thats pretty shady to attempt. https://t.co/iUAwj7rU4J
